footnotes.text:
1John Henryintroduced the bill in theHouse of Representativeson January 9, 1840.  On January 10, the House referred the bill to the Committee
                  on Finance, of whichAbraham Lincolnwas a member.  The Committee on Finance reported back the bill on January 18 with
                  anamendment, and the House tabled the bill and proposed amendment.Illinois HouseJournal. 1839. 11th G. A., special sess.,   141, 143, 202.
2The originalactonly ordered assessors to specify the county in which the property was located.

3On January 18, 1839, the House Committee on Finance proposed anamendmentto strike out this section and replace it with a new second section.Illinois HouseJournal. 1839. 11th G. A., special sess., 202.
